description:
A state-of-the-art set up for tackling big lines. The Precision Lock System is engineered to get mechanical thrust from your legs to your skis, without making the boots feel too rigid. With 55 degrees of walking motion, this boot flexes with comfort, letting you take longer strides for a faster ascent. Quick transitions, unparalleled walking efficiency, and wicked ski performance...this boot does it all.

  • Grilamid shell, polyurethane cuff and spoiler makes for a stiff and super lightweight boot
  • LIGHT FIT Liner with mapped construction offers a cradled fit
  • Cuff and buckle catches prevent unwanted release
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 55 degrees
  • Progressive forward flex of 120 for quick rebound and ski response
  • Light Lock power strap allows for quick and easy transitions
  • 4 lightweight buckles that loosen for walk mode
  • Forward lean adjustment of 12 or 13 degrees
  • Compatible with tech bindings only
name: Tecnica Zero G Tour Scout 120 U Ski Boots - Unisex
